description: The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires an Open License on LiDAR data acquired in 2021 in the Lloydminster region.
full_summary:
**Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) – Open License on LiDAR Data**
================================COOKIE stares conclusions Domestic Release*

* **Title English**: Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) Open License on LiDAR data acquired in 2021 in the Lloydminster region
* **Title French**: Ministère de Ressources Naturelles Canada (RNCan) licence ouverte sur des données lidar acquis en 2021 dans la région de Lloydminster
* **Reference Number**: cb-304-32912244
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000079469
* **Publication Date**: January 30, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 14, 2024, 14:00:00 (EST)
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
* **Contact Information**:

|  | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Name** | Vincent Gariépy | Vincent Gariépy |
| **Email** | vincent.gariepy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca | vincent.gariepy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca |
| **Phone** | (819) 239-9895 | (819) 239-9895 |
| **Address** | 50 Place de la Cité, Suite 212 | 50 Place de la Cité, Suite 212 |
| **City** | Sherbrooke, QC | Sherbrooke, QC |
| **Country** | Canada | Canada |


**Notice Description**
----------------------

The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites companies to submit a proposal for an open license on LiDAR data acquired in 2021 in the Lloydminster region. The proposed license must be compatible with the Open Government License – Canada, which allows the use and distribution of the LiDAR data and derivative products generated by the Government of Canada to the entire population without restriction.

The solicitation number is NRCan-5000079469, and the tender closing date is February 14, 2024, 14:00:00 (EST).

**Attachments**

The tender notice and supporting documentation can be accessed through the Canada Buys portal at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30801. The notice number is
